message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.LO, cs.DM, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the representation and computation of regular sets of integer vectors, which is a topic related to data structures (cs.DS) and computational geometry (cs.CG). The proof of the convex hull being a polyhedron involves techniques from linear optimization (cs.LO) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). Finally, the paper also discusses the use of logic in the representation of integer sets, which could be relevant to the category of computational complexity (cs.CC).
